description:
Job Title: Senior Sales Executive - Wireless Telecommunications

Location: Irvine, CA

Base: $100-119k base + commission


Work with a leading telecommunications providers based within the United States who are looking to expand their teams within Irvine.


Position Summary: As a Senior Sales Executive, you will play a pivotal role in expanding our client base by selling our wireless telecommunications services to Fortune 1000 companies in the local area.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to achieve revenue targets and drive business growth in the Irvine, CA market.
  • Identify and prospect new business opportunities within Fortune 1000 companies, building and maintaining a robust sales pipeline.
  • Establish and nurture strong relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders within target organizations.
  • Conduct comprehensive needs assessments to understand client requirements and present tailored wireless telecommunications solutions that address their business challenges.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, Telecommunications, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales, with a focus on selling wireless telecommunications services.
  • Proven track record of successfully selling into Fortune 1000 companies and achieving or exceeding sales targets.
  • In-depth knowledge of the wireless telecommunications industry, including technologies, products, and market trends.
